inventory.commentary: 'Attribute' and 'Degree of goodness' will be the most frequently used senses.

sense.name: degree of goodness
sense.examples: The quality of students has risen. An executive of low quality has been fired from the firm. Sugar is often used to try to compensate for chocolate of low quality.

sense.name: attribute
sense.commentary: property - an essential and distinguishing attribute or property of something or someone
sense.examples: "The quality of mercy is not strained." - Shakespeare Honesty is a noble quality to possess.

sense.name: uniqueness
sense.commentary: character, lineament - a characteristic property that defines the apparent individual nature of something
sense.examples: Each town has a quality all its own. The radical quality of our demands.

sense.name: tone
sense.commentary: timbre, timber, tone - the distinctive property of a complex sound (a voice or musical sound)
sense.examples: The quality of her soprano was rich and lovely. The muffled tones of the broken bell summoned them to meet.
